      • execute

        public abstract double execute​(double weight,
                               ScriptedSimilarity.Query query,
                               ScriptedSimilarity.Field field,
                               ScriptedSimilarity.Term term,
                               ScriptedSimilarity.Doc doc)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Compute the score.
        Parameters:
        weight - weight computed by the SimilarityWeightScript if any, or 1.
        query - scoring factors that come from the query
        field - field-level statistics
        term - term-level statistics
        doc - per-document statistics
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
